comments.body: Quote from: Ivekzg on April 18, 2023, 12:21:20 PMI would like to exchange USDT ERC20 for BTC.300-800$ is for exchange, you can contact me here or via Telegram.Escrow accepted of course.Hello,Are you looking for a 1:1 rate?

comments.author: Timelord2067
comments.body: Quote from: Ivekzg on April 18, 2023, 08:04:51 PMQuote from: alterra57 on April 18, 2023, 06:57:50 PMQuote from: Ivekzg on April 18, 2023, 12:21:20 PMI would like to exchange USDT ERC20 for BTC.300-800$ is for exchange, you can contact me here or via Telegram.Escrow accepted of course.Hello,Are you looking for a 1:1 rate?Yes if posible.$100 USD = BTC 0.003304 - if you are okay doing that trade and you go first, I'll swap you.  My USDT ERC20 wallet address is 0x8987524a566768Ff4365dAE5088Ae9AaEae73320Hope to hear from you soon.  (I'll check back in in ten hours)

comments.author: Timelord2067
comments.body: Quote from: Ivekzg on April 19, 2023, 06:42:18 AMYou have only 100$ for trade? Correct. See above for my offer. I'll check back in a couple of hours.

comments.author: Timelord2067
comments.body: Quote from: Ivekzg on April 19, 2023, 08:29:30 AMThank you for offer but the amount is too low and transaction fee too high for me to be worth.Get back to me if you have no other offers.Regards,

comments.author: logfiles
comments.body: Quote from: Ivekzg on April 19, 2023, 08:29:30 AMThank you for offer but the amount is too low and transaction fee too high for me to be worth.How about using USDT TRC20 instead of USDT ERC20 for the transaction? I think the former is still preferred because of the lower transaction fees, at least for now until everything normalizes of the Ethereum blockchain.

comments.author: Timelord2067
comments.body: That would work for me.I'll check back in eight hours.
